channel.title: Lee-Ping Wang on OpenFF
channel.description: Recent content in Lee-Ping Wang on OpenFF

item.title: Lee-Ping Wang stepping down from a leadership role
item.description: From August 1, the Open Force Field Initiative will undergo a change in the leadership team, as Lee-Ping Wang has decided to step down from his role as an OpenFF primary investigator. This not a farewell, but a change of roles and Dr. Wang will remain actively involved in OpenFF research efforts as a co-investigator. The Open Force Field Initiative owes a great deal of its success to the work done by Dr.
